references: D. S. Thakur, J. Number Theory, Vol. 66, pp. 129-147, 1997.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 54000); x=contfrac((exp(1)+1)/3); for (n=1, 20000, write("b028360.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 14 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A160388 = Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 14 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
